name: @rainstormy/presets-prettier
description: A predefined, opinionated Prettier configuration suitable for any TypeScript project.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.prettier-plugin-organize-imports: This Prettier plugin sorts import statements and removes unused ones.
dependencies.prettier-plugin-packagejson: This Prettier plugin sorts properties in the `package.json` file.

devDependencies.prettier: Prettier ships with type definitions for its configuration objects.
devDependencies.typescript: TypeScript is a statically typed programming language on top of JavaScript.

peerDependencies.prettier: The preset is made for Prettier. When declared as a peer dependency, the package manager will remind the user to install it.
peerDependencies.typescript: TypeScript is a peer dependency of `prettier-plugin-organize-imports`.
